Key Match Events: Aaron Civale and Aaron Ashby combined on a two-hit shutout.
Garrett Mitchell homered for the Brewers.
Jackson Chourio drove in two runs.
Aaron Civale worked seven innings for his longest outing of the season.
Aaron Ashby pitched two perfect innings, striking out three.
Joey Ortiz hit a double during the second inning.
Blake Perkins' sacrifice fly scored a run.
Willy Adames' aggressive baserunning led to Contreras stealing home.
Jackson Chourio hit a two-run double.
William Contreras drove in a run with a base hit.
Post-Match Reflections: Brewers manager Pat Murphy praised the team's resilience and competitiveness.
Giants manager Bob Melvin reflected on the team's poor performance and praised the opposing pitcher.
